page.title: 05T.V AND BOOKS IN CARLTON
page.content:
Quite a lot of time in the day is taken up watching television.Nearly everyone in our class watched five to eight hours nearly{every day}! We seem to like boisterous programmes or murders. Sometimes we take it too much for granted.We get home,walk in switch on and settle down for hours.{I think {there should be less violence on {television,which provokes young {children because they beleve most of {it and think it's real life and copy {what they see.}The children in our school read alot. Most people read{1-3 {hours}a day.We seem to like books where silly or foolish thing happen.The things people like reading most are things like{"The Twits"}and "Georges{Marvellous Medicine". }I like animal books like{"Jinny"}books.
Janet Armitage Age 11
